Text: Ehm hey zibbik, srry for asking earlier for Lisa Guyer, I know its rare stuff.... so don't bother.Would you mind though uploading Blue Ă–yster Cult discography? Its a band that deserves good rips (he he) plzz reply.....

Don't Fear the Reaper: The Best of Blue Ă–yster Cult doesn't have it anymore(better I think).Also some other songs have been digitally remaster....
